statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_name, shipment_date FROM transportation_costs WHERE total_cost > 100;
SELECT shipment_id, origin_location, destination_location FROM transportation_costs WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, total_cost, delivery_status FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT carrier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_shipments FROM transportation_costs GROUP BY carrier_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY shipment_date DESC, total_cost DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_name, shipment_date, origin_location, destination_location, total_cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY total_cost ASC;
SELECT carrier_name, shipment_date, origin_location, destination_location, total_cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE origin_location = 'New York' AND destination_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE total_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY shipment_date DESC, total_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM carriers;
SELECT carrier_name, carrier_type FROM carriers;
SELECT carrier_name, shipping_cost FROM carriers WHERE carrier_type='Express';
SELECT carrier_name, shipping_cost FROM carriers ORDER BY shipping_cost DESC;
SELECT carrier_name, shipping_cost FROM carriers WHERE shipping_cost > 10 ORDER BY carrier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM carriers WHERE carrier_type='Air';
SELECT carrier_name, shipping_cost FROM carriers ORDER BY shipping_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_logs WHERE shipping_date > '2021-01-01' AND shipping_cost < 100;
SELECT carrier_name, shipping_cost FROM carriers WHERE carrier_type='Land' AND shipping_cost BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY carrier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_logs WHERE shipped_from='New York' AND shipped_to='Los Angeles' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM carriers WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT carrier_name, cost_per_mile FROM carriers WHERE carrier_type = 'Truck';
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance_in_miles >= 500 ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, cost_estimate FROM routes WHERE cost_estimate < 2000;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, payment_status FROM shipments WHERE shipment_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM carriers ORDER BY rating DESC, cost_per_mile ASC;
SELECT carrier_name, carrier_type, cost_per_mile FROM carriers WHERE carrier_type = 'Truck';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, shipment_cost FROM shipments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance_in_miles, cost_estimate FROM routes WHERE average_speed > 50;

SELECT c.carrier_name, r.origin, r.destination, s.shipment_cost FROM carriers c JOIN routes r ON c.carrier_id = r.best_carrier_id JOIN shipments s ON r.route_id = s.route_id WHERE c.rating > 4 ORDER BY s.shipment_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_name, shipment_cost FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT carrier_name, shipment_cost, shipment_date FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY shipment_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM carrier_details WHERE carrier_location = 'New York';
SELECT tracking_id, shipment_id, tracking_status, tracking_timestamp FROM shipment_tracking ORDER BY tracking_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY shipment_cost DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_name, shipment_cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE carrier_name = 'ABC Transport';
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_name, shipment_date FROM transportation_costs WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM carrier_details WHERE carrier_type = 'Air';
SELECT tracking_id, tracking_status, tracking_timestamp FROM shipment_tracking WHERE tracking_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM carriers;
SELECT carrier_name, contact_person FROM carriers ORDER BY carrier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_cost > 500 ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, from_location, to_location FROM shipments WHERE carrier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM carriers WHERE carrier_id = 1;
SELECT carrier_name, contact_person FROM carriers WHERE carrier_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT shipments.shipment_id, shipments.shipment_date, routes.start_location, routes.end_location, costs.amount FROM shipments LEFT JOIN routes ON shipments.from_location = routes.start_location LEFT JOIN costs ON shipments.shipment_id = costs.shipment_id;

SELECT shipments.shipment_id, carriers.carrier_name, shipments.from_location, shipments.to_location, routes.distance FROM shipments INNER JOIN carriers ON shipments.carrier_id = carriers.carrier_id INNER JOIN routes ON shipments.from_location = routes.start_location;
SELECT costs.cost_category, SUM(amount) AS total_cost FROM costs GROUP BY costs.cost_category ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
